message: Let's be fair, Bob. I'm offering you 40% to avoid drawn-out negotiations.
I think a 50/50 split is the fairest way to start. Let's see if we can work together to reach an agreement.
Bob, time is money, literally! I'm willing to compromise slightly. 55/45?
I'm willing to go up to 60/40, but I think we need to be more realistic about the time value of money.  Let's reach a compromise before things get worse for both of us.
Bob, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest and quickest way to settle this.
